title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - May 21 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - May 21 2022
description:
The long knives are out for Hunter Biden. NBC News reports: Analysis of Hunter Biden's hard drive shows he, his firm took in about $11 million from 2013 to 2018, spent it fast! Who pays a crackhead $11 million dollars?! What are Joe Biden's options for Hunter Biden? Clay says, "I think one of Joe Biden's final acts may be pardoning his son." Department of Homeland Security is warning about "extremist violence" that could come from "either side" if Roe v. Wade is struck down. Buck says, "This is not a 'both sides' issue. I'm sorry -- we're not gonna play this game." Rapper Zuby pushes back on Black Lives Matter: "They're not helping black people in general. They are helping themselves. The way you stop racism is by people not being racist. It's not by calling everyone racist."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
The long knives are out for Hunter Biden. NBC News reports: Analysis of Hunter Biden's hard drive shows he, his firm took in about $11 million from 2013 to 2018, spent it fast! Who pays a crackhead $11 million dollars?! What are Joe Biden's options for Hunter Biden? Clay says, "I think one of Joe Biden's final acts may be pardoning his son." Department of Homeland Security is warning about "extremist violence" that could come from "either side" if Roe v. Wade is struck down. Buck says, "This is not a 'both sides' issue. I'm sorry -- we're not gonna play this game." Rapper Zuby pushes back on Black Lives Matter: "They're not helping black people in general. They are helping themselves. The way you stop racism is by people not being racist. It's not by calling everyone racist."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
